mapper.insert: insert into t_prevention (u_id, pv_addr, pv_area, pv_date, pv_st_dt, pv_ed_dt, pv_price, pv_note) value(#{u_id}, #{pv_addr}, #{pv_area}, now(), #{pv_st_dt}, #{pv_ed_dt},#{pv_price}, #{pv_note})
insert into t_image (u_id, p_name, p_path,p_list, p_date) value(#{u_id}, #{p_name}, #{p_path},#{p_list},now())
mapper.select: select p_num from t_image ORDER BY p_date DESC LIMIT 1
select * from t_image where u_id = #{u_id} and p_name = #{p_name} ORDER BY p_date desc
